show_name: Onegai My Melody: Kuru Kuru Shuffle!
other_title: おねがいマイメロディ くるくるシャッフル！
ending_theme: #1: "Hare ☆ Sora (ハレ☆ソラ)" by MY MELODIES (eps 1-27)
#3: "Ore wa usamimi kamen (おれはウサミミ仮面)" by Ryotaro Okiayu (ep 29)
#4: "Dream! Dream! Dream! (ドリーム!ドリーム!ドリーム!)" by Yume no Uta to Yumebouei shoujo-tai (ep 30)
#5: "Romy no Yume (ロミーの夢)" by Junko Takeuchi (ep 31)
#6: "Te Wo Tsunagou (手をつなごう)" by MY MELODIES to Mary Land no Nkama-tachi (eps 32-52)
